Police Arrest Ice Prince

  • Achu-ulim Agbama
  • 9/4/2022, 8:17:00 PM

Police arrest popular Musician Ice Prince for assaulting a policeman. The spoke person for Lagos state police command revealed this on Friday via twitter.
